original: samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṁ
analyzed: samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa
corrected: samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṁ

original: antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṁ sokasallaṁ—
analyzed: cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassam soka salla
corrected: antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassam soka salla

original: Idampi “yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ”.
analyzed: idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi
corrected: idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkham

original: Idampi “yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ”.
analyzed: idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi
corrected: idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkham

original: Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yā ayam taṇhā ponobhavikā nandi rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī
corrected: yā ayam taṇhā ponobhavikā nandi rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī seyyathidam

original: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo
corrected: ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathidaṁ

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye pañcaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye pañcaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam tasmin samaye pañcaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti
corrected: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandhābhiññaṁ tasmin samaye pañcaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti

original: siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi,
analyzed: siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya siyā na vattabba sukhāya vedanāya
corrected: siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ siyā na vattabbaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttantipi

original: siyā na vattabbaṁ—“savitakkasavicāran”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattan”tipi, “avitakkaavicāran”tipi.
analyzed: siyā na vattabba sa vitakka sa vicāra avitakka vicāra matta ntipi avitakka avicāra avitakka
corrected: siyā na vattabbaṁ savitakka sa vicāran tipi avitakka vicāra mattan tipi avitakka avicāran tipi

original: Nirodhasaccaṁ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmi.
analyzed: nirodha saccam na iva ācaya gāmi na apacaya gāmi
corrected: nirodha saccam neva ācaya gāmi na apacaya gāmi

original: “uppannan”tipi, “anuppannan”tipi, “uppādī”tipi.
analyzed: uppannam iti anuppannam ipi uppādi iti
corrected: uppannam iti pi anuppannam iti pi uppādi iti pi

original: “hetu ceva sahetukañcā”tipi, “sahetukañceva na ca hetū”tipi.
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukam ca atipi sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetu utipi
corrected: hetu ca eva sa hetukam ca iti api sa hetukam ca eva na ca hetu iti api

original: Maggasaccaṁ siyā na hetusahetukaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“na hetusahetukan”tipi, “na hetuahetukan”tipi.
analyzed: magga saccam siyā na hetu sahetuka siyā na hetu ahetuka tipi
corrected: magga saccam siyā na hetu sahetukam siyā na vattabbam na hetu sahetukan tipi na hetu ahetukan tipi

original: Samudayasaccaṁ āsavo ceva sāsavañca.
analyzed: samudaya saccam āsavaḥ ca iva sa āsavam ca
corrected: samudaya saccam āsavo ca eva sa āsavam ca

original: no ca saṁyojanaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“saṁyojanañceva saṁyojanasampayuttañcā”tipi,
analyzed: no ca siyā na vattabba sayojanam ca iva sayojana sampayuttam ca atipi
corrected: no ca saṁyojanaṁ siyā na vattabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ ca eva saṁyojana sampayuttaṁ ca atipi

original: “saṁyojanasampayuttañceva no ca saṁyojanan”tipi.
analyzed: sayojana sampayuttam ca iva no ca
corrected: saṁyojana sampayuttañ ceva no ca saṁyojanan ti pi

original: Samudayasaccaṁ gantho ceva ganthaniyañca.
analyzed: samudaya saccam ca iva ganthaniyam ca
corrected: samudaya saccam gantho ca eva ganthaniyam ca

original: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā nīvaraṇaṁ, siyā no nīvaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: dukkha saccam siyā no nīvaraṇa
corrected: dukkha saccam siyā nīvaraṇam siyā no nīvaraṇam

original: “parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā cā”tipi, “parāmaṭṭhā ceva no ca parāmāsā”tipi.
analyzed: parāmāsā ca iva parāmaṭṭhā ca atipi parāmaṭṭhā ca iva no ca
corrected: parāmāsā ca eva parāmaṭṭhā ca iti api parāmaṭṭhā ca eva no ca parāmāsā iti api

original: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū, siyā no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū.
analyzed: dukkha saccam siyā siyā no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū
corrected: dukkha saccam siyā citta saṁsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū siyā no citta saṁsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū

original: “kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā cā”tipi, “saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
analyzed: kilesā ca iva saṅkilesikā ca atipi saṅkilesikā ca iva no ca
corrected: kilesā ca eva saṅkilesikā ca iti pi saṅkilesikā ca eva no ca kilesā iti pi
